name: MONEYBAGS (Unoriginal Studios)
description:
Say hello to Moneybags M. Bigbucks. The CEO of MoneyBags, Inc. After gaining massive amounts of wealth, the IRS wants their cut. Help Moneybags protect his fortune by collecting money and avoiding the IRS.

There are plans to include controller support at a later date

This is my first ever game made with GameMaker Studio 2 so feedback is appreciated. If this project gets enough traction I will update the game to address any and all comments and concerns.
